KBRI Kuala Lumpur: Pebalap Afridza Munandar Tewas karena Cedera Kepala
03 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - KBRI Kuala Lumpur Malaysia menyebut PDRM atau polisi Malaysia telah mengeluarkan hasil autopsi penyebab kematian pebalap Indonesia Afridza Munandar. Afridza Munandar disebut tewas karena cedera kepala.
"Siang ini PDRM (polisi) Malaysia telah mengeluarkan hasil autopsi yang menyebutkan penyebab kematian adalah cedera kepala karena kecelakaan (head injury due to crash)," kata Fungsi Protokol dan Konsuler KBRI Kuala Lumpur Malaysia, Yusron B Ambary dalam keterangannya, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Jenazah Afridza sudah dibawa keluar dari rumah sakit setempat. Jenazah Afridza Munandar rencananya diterbangka ke Indonesia esok hari.
"Sore tadi jenazah Afridza sudah dikeluarkan dari RS KL untuk selanjutnya akan dimandikan dan disalatkan di Masjid Tun Abdul Aziz di Petaling Jaya, Selangor," jelas Yusron.
"Besok rencananya jenazah akan diterbangkan ke Jakarta menggunakan Garuda GA 821, ETD Soeta pukul 14.00 didampingi oleh official dari Astra Honda Indonesia," imbuh dia.
Afridza Munandar mengalami kecelakaan saat Race 1 ATC di Sirkuit Sepang, tepatnya pada tikungan 10 di lap pertama. Dia dilarikan ke rumah sakit di Kuala Lumpur setelah sempat mendapatkan pertolongan pertama.
Afridza Munandar tampil di Sepang untuk memperebutkan gelar juara Asia Talent Cup. Pebalap tersebut juga pernah memperkuat Astra Honda Racing Team dalam ajang Suzuka Endurance 4 Hours di Jepang.

Indonesian Embassy in Kuala Lumpur: Rider Afridza Munandar Killed due to Head Injury
Nov 3, 2019, 19:00 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - The Indonesian Embassy in Kuala Lumpur said the PDRM or Malaysian police had issued autopsy results on the death of Indonesian rider Afridza Munandar. Afridza Munandar is said to have died from a head injury.
"This afternoon the Malaysian PDRM (police) has issued an autopsy which stated that the cause of death was a head injury due to crash," said the Indonesian Embassy in Kuala Lumpur's Protocol and Consular Function, Yusron B Ambary in his statement on Sunday (3 / 11/2019).
Afridza's body has been taken out of the local hospital. It is planned that Afridza Munandar's body will be transported to Indonesia tomorrow.
"This afternoon Afridza's body had been removed from KL Hospital to be bathed and sealed at the Tun Abdul Aziz Mosque in Petaling Jaya, Selangor," Yusron explained.
"Tomorrow the body is planned to be flown to Jakarta using Garuda GA 821, ETD Soeta at 14.00 accompanied by an official from Astra Honda Indonesia," he added.
Afridza Munandar had an accident during Race 1 ATC at the Sepang Circuit, precisely at bend 10 on the first lap. He was rushed to a hospital in Kuala Lumpur after being able to get first aid.
Afridza Munandar appeared in Sepang to compete for the Asia Talent Cup title. The rider has also strengthened the Astra Honda Racing Team in the Suzuka Endurance 4 Hours event in Japan.
